title: This Week's Top Stories - The GOP's Impeachment Dodge & Wall Street Halts the GameStop Rally
itunes:title: This Week's Top Stories - The GOP's Impeachment Dodge & Wall Street Halts the GameStop Rally
description:
Republicans rely on tortured logic to resist Donald Trump's impeachment, trading firms take heat for restricting trades on GameStop, and the GOP balks at President Biden's call for unity.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
